about_the_game:
Take the sounds of Leowald with you wherever you go! The soundtrack mp3s will be located in the Soundtrack folder inside the Leowald folder.

No. - Song Title - Duration
1 - Adventure! - 2:29\
2 - Good Fortune - 1:27
3 - Leowald - 2:15

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Any
  • Processor: Any
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Storage: 80 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Soundtrack for Leowald. Includes additional bonus tracks.
